loginchat.config.serverslist.desc: List of servers on which the mod is enabled
loginchat.config.messageslist.desc: List of the messages the mod should send at the start of the session. May contain commands, those should start with a /. This list is ignored if the Messages List Mode is set to PER_SERVER
loginchat.config.messageslist.mode.desc:
SHARED - the messages sent to all servers in the list will be the same and specified in the Messages List field of this config file

PER_SERVER - the messages sent to every server will be custom and will need to be specified in the text files in the mod config folder
loginchat.config.openfolder.desc: Opens the folder containing the messages list files for the PER_SERVER messages list mode using your system's file manager
loginchat.config.singleplayer.desc: Should the mod send the messages, specified in the messages list, at the start of the singleplayer session?
loginchat.config.delay.desc: The amount of time in milliseconds that will pass since joining the server or the world before the chat messages you specified in the config will be sent
loginchat.chat.ip: Server IP for the Login Chat configuration file:
loginchat.chat.listPerServerEnabled: The Message List Per Server mode is enabled. Open the ModMenu config menu for more information.
